title: Validate a Shipping Address
description: When a customer enters their address during online checkout, the system must validate it to ensure it's a deliverable address and to prevent shipping errors.

tasks.description: The system captures the address entered by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The raw address data is received.

tasks.description: The system sends the address to an address validation service API.
tasks.expected_outcome: The API call is made successfully.

tasks.description: The API returns a standardized version of the address (e.g., 'Street' becomes 'ST') and classifies it as 'Residential'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The address is corrected and classified.

tasks.description: The system updates the order with the validated, standardized address.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order now has a clean, validated address, reducing the risk of delivery failure.
